group_1.textCenter: (Yeah, I think this is where it was...)
Wonder Water. Guaranteed to quench @your thirst and rejuvenate your tired body.
Would you like to try a cup?
No one's here... Maybe it's not open every@day.
(I can't even be sure if the water station @has anythin' to do with it...)
I should probably retrace my steps from@yesterday...
(Maybe I can ask them about that water@station?)

group_1.narration: Have you heard? Has anyone told you?
When I wandered closer to the school,@I saw this strange thing mumblin' somethin'@to itself over and over like a poem.
The first time I saw it, I thought it must@be a Familiar. But it didn't have any kind@of Labyrinth around it. Also, the longer I@stared, the less it looked like a Familiar.
What's more... @There was a student there standin'@next to it, chattin' up a storm.@It was pretty freaky.

group_1.textCenter: If that's not a Familiar, then what the hell@is it?

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, there's something I'd like to@talk with you about.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Who are you...

group_1.textRight: I'm Yachiyo Nanami, a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, so you just come out and say it?
Yup.
I'm Kyoko Sakura, and yeah, I'm a @Magical Girl.
Well, now that that's all out there,@what do you want, anyways?
This isn't the kind of city where you hack@each other up to steal territory, right?

group_1.textRight: That's correct. I don't intend to do@anything so pointless.
I'm only interested in the creature that@just vanished.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that thing? What was it, anyway?
It wasn't a Familiar, that's for sure.@Other than that, I have no clue.

group_1.textRight: I see, so you don't know either.

group_1.textLeft: That was my first time seein' one.
Ah! [chara:200601:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:200601:cheek_0][chara:200601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200601:lipSynch_1][chara:200601:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Damn it, not again…
Oh yeah, they've been droppin' out of thin @air since yesterday. Regular as clockwork.

group_1.textRight: Did you happen to drink some water?@From somewhere with an owl sign on it?

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah,[chara:200601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200601:cheek_0][chara:200601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:200601:lipSynch_1] I drank some. It was amazin'!
How'd you know that, though?

group_1.textRight: The water could be the reason why@those pieces of paper are appearing.

group_1.narration: Accordin' to this girl, Yachiyo Nanami,@I'm tangled up in some rumor@that's actually becomin' real.
Only it turned out she didn't@know jack about the rumor.
Just that when the numbers on the@paper reach zero, somethin' bad@would probably happen...
But the important thing is, the culprits@responsible for turnin' rumors into a@reality are some monsters totally@different from Witches, called "Uwasa".

group_1.textRight: I have a proposal for you. How about@investigating the [textBlue:Rumors] with me?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, [chara:200601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:200601:lipSynch_1]I'm good.
It's simple.
These "Uwasa" you're talkin' about@aren't Witches.
If they were, well, we could do business,@no prob.
When ya beat a Witch, the people they@were controllin' return to normal.
But Uwasa are nothin' like Witches, right?
So, no guarantee you can save everyone@like you can with a Witch.
Ya see, that doesn't put me in the mood to@play besties with you.
Wish I could repay ya for the info, but@not so much I wanna put my life on the line.
Sorry. I'll be goin' now.

group_1.textCenter: (Team up so we can survive? Sorry, not@interested.)
(Say it ended up with one of us givin' up@our life to save the other.)
(If somethin' like that were to happen, @there's no way I wouldn't be hella pissed.)
(Once it gets to that point it's too late@for regrets.)
That's why I'll always stick to bein' a@loner.
